Translations.Text: zaviska ta seer ye ne rivna
Ne yavlyayutʹ soboyu temryavu ta svitlo
Ne yavlyayutʹ soboyu coolness tini ta tepla sontsya
Ne yavlyayutʹ soboyu zhyttya ta mertve; BOH vyklykaye whomever Vin wills shchob pochuty. Vy ne mozhete zrobyty slukhacham z tsykh u graves
Vy ne ye bilʹsh nizh warner
My poslaly vam z pravdoyu, pred'yavnykom harnoyi novyny, tak zhe, yak i warner. Kozhna spilʹnota povynna otrymaty warner
Yakshcho vony disbelieve vy, tsi pered tym, yak yim takozh disbelieved. Yikhni kur'yery poyikhaly yim z yasnymy dokazamy, ta Psalomamy, ta vysvitlyuyuchymy svyatymy pysannyam
Z·hodom, ya pokarav tsi khto disbelieved; yak strashnyy Miy retribution

vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho BOH posylaye vnyz z neba voda, tym samym my vyroblyayemo frukty riznomanitnykh kolʹoriv? Navitʹ hory mayutʹ rizni kolʹory; vershyny ye bili, abo chervonyy, abo deyakyy inshyy kolir. Ta ravens chorni
Takozh, lyudy, tvaryny, ta domashna khudoba vkhodyla do riznomanitnykh kolʹoriv. Tse chomu lyudy kotryy spravdi BOH povahy ye tsey khto knowledgeable. BOH ye Mohutniy, Probachayuchy

Bezsumnivno, tsey khto deklamuyutʹ knyhu BOHA, zauvazhuyutʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat), ta z nashykh umov yim vony vytrachayutʹ - sekretno ta suspilʹno - zaymayutʹsya investytsiyeyu shcho nikoly ne hubytʹ
Vin vidshkoduye yim velykodushno, ta pomnozhytʹ Yoho blahoslovennya na nykh. Vin Probachaye, Appreciative
